data.name: Garden of Now
data.description: Smartphones. Smartwatches. Social Media. IoT devices. Artificial Intelligence. Automation. All the technology developed in the last decades is changing our world at enormous scales and at a crazy-fast pace.

data.name: Mobile
data.description: iOS and Android mobile design and development conferences.

relatedRecords.name: Mobius
relatedRecords.description: A conference for mobile apps developers. June 23-24, Saint-Petersburg, Russia. More than 600 participants, two days, dozens of technical talks.

relatedRecords.name: FlutterConf.by Conference
relatedRecords.description: FlutterConf.by is the first Belarusian conference dedicated to Flutter technology by Google. Organized by local enthusiasts together with SUP, it’s aimed to encourage knowledge and ideas sharing thus spreading out the use of the technology in the country.

relatedRecords.name: Mobiconf
relatedRecords.description: The beating heart of Mobiconf is shaped by mobile development & UI/UX design. But the future is here… mind to come for Big Data and Machine Learning related talks! | 5th edition | 4-5 October 2018 | Krakow, Poland
